page.title: 02Customs
page.content: A Fox Hunt takes place along a bridle path, which goes through the area. This Hunt takes place from August to March and has a three week break between hunts. It is watched by the local people and is an enjoyable sight. In{Elberton}they have an annual fete and an annual skittle match. The winner of the skittle match recives a salmon, which is kindly donated by Mr. Bamfield, who putchers salmon in the River Severn near{Aust.} They run regular Barn Dances in aid of Elberton Church and Littleton Church.
